fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Starcaller's Watch__
Citlali's signature that gives her the best balance between team buffs and a strong shield.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__A Thousand Floating Dreams__ 
A strong Elemental Mastery stat stick that also provides a teamwide EM and ATK% buff.

__Wandering Evenstar__
An Elemental Mastery stat stick that also provides a good teamwide ATK% buff.

__Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers__ 
Provides the biggest ATK% buff at the cost of losing some Elemental Mastery. 

__Favonius Codex__
Provides particles for energy heavy teams.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Elemental Mastery or Energy Recharge|<goblet> Elemental Mastery or Cryo DMG Bonus%|<circlet> Elemental Mastery or CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Dawnfrost Darkstar
**2)** Elemental Burst: Edict of Entwined Splendor
**N/A)** Normal Attack: Shadow-Stealing Spirit Vessel

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Citlali, as an Elemental mastery scaler can be built for damage since her ascension 4 passive gives her a sizeable Elemental Burst DMG buff, allowing her to deal high damage with her melts.
